mapper.sql: id, name, archive_no, id_number, visit_date, visit_type, symptom, symptom_other, blood_pressure_high, blood_pressure_low, weight_now, weight_next, height, bmi_now, bmi_next, dorsal_artery, pulsation_position, other, smoke_now, smoke_next, drink_now, drink_next, sports_num_now, sports_time_now, sports_num_next, sports_time_next, staple_food_now, staple_food_next, psychological_recovery, medical_compliance, blood_glucose, glycosylated_hemoglobin, check_date, compliance, untoward_effect, untoward_effect_drug, reactive_hypoglycemia, follow_type, insulin_name, insulin_usage, transfer_treatment, transfer_treatment_reason, transfer_treatment_department, next_visit_date, visit_doctor, advice, create_user, create_name, create_org, create_org_name, create_time, update_user, update_name, update_time, upload_status, upload_time, upload_result
mapper.select:
select
from diabetes_follow_record where archive_no = #{archiveNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_time desc limit 1

select
from diabetes_follow_record where 1 = 1
and archive_no = #{archiveNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by create_time desc

select
from diabetes_follow_record where 1 = 1
and archive_no = #{archiveNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and visit_date like concat(#{visitDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by create_time asc

select
from diabetes_follow_record r where ifnull(upload_status,0) = 0 and EXISTS(select 1 from ltd_organization o where o.organ_code = r.create_org and o.province_code = '61')

update diabetes_follow_record

smoke_next = #{smokeNext,jdbcType=INTEGER},
drink_now = #{drinkNow,jdbcType=INTEGER},
drink_next = #{drinkNext,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
